column4: okay please help me  i have connected my laptop directly to my modem and yet still no internet
is it an Actiontec or not?  Who is your broadband provider?  Qwest?
the reason I ask is that its DHCP server doesn't properly set dns servers, so you have to prepend or supersede them in the dhcp client config files
well, we're not sure that's your problem yet, but you'd edit your /etc/dhcp3/dhclient.conf (man dhclient for details)
i set it up in network so does that not mean that i should work
you can setup a network, and still not have DNS configured properly
how do i know what to change
we need to figure out if DNS is the problem before you try to change anything
how would i know if dns  is the problem
can you please describe the problem in more detail?
that is exactly what i do
doesn't your DSL model have a dhcp server?
i will go and boot up ubuntu and try it with dhcp
build a new kernel for what?
emm to get a native driver for ubuntu
